short_summary: DND conducts a variety of research and development activities to develop and improve specific capabilities that are required to support its unique operational mandate.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
tags: Engineering and Research and Technology Based Services
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Details
- **Reference Number**: WS3899-036307
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Publication Date**: April 3, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date**: May 3, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2023

## Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3899-036307
- **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity and End User
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)
- **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Request for Proposal (RFP)
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide engineering and manufacturing services for research and development activities. The contractor will be required to design, manufacture, and modify prototype parts, assemblies, and components for various projects.

## Important Details
- **Contract Term**: June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2026
- **Option Periods**: Two 1-year option periods

## Tender Details
- **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15887307?extsite=MTU4ODczMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Contact Information**: Roxanne Montpetit (SPAC/PSPC), roxanne.montpetit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
